meaningMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an い on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>stiff</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>stiff</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>hard</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>firm</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as a very similar word, 固い. So, if you can use that word to help you to remember, you'll remember the reading of this word in no time as well!
